The final project is titled as \textit{Comparison of Different Homogeneity Tests: Contrast Test, Cochran’s Test, and Zelen’s Test on a Multivariate Stratum Based on the Simulation Study}. 

When the stratified-specific contingency table occurred, the test of association such as chi-square test (Cochran's test), Mantel-Haenszel test, or an exact test can be applied but they increased the Type I error for the set of tests since multiple tests occurred in this phase.(Page 121 textbook)
